E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 5/28/1992
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Tatsunori Hara



Date: Monday, 6/2/1992
Subject: Progress of Mark Thompson
Dear Sir,
Mark Thompson has nothing more to prove at A Modesto A's!
He has an ERA of 3.88 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
